function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of transformative impact in managing VBDs like malaria","Impact":"Slow progress towards disease elimination","Mitigation":"Implement a more effective approach to managing VBDs","Technologies":"Health-aware design and construction technologies","People":"City residents, especially in areas affected by VBDs","Owner":"Health and built environment professionals"},{"Description":"Need for convergence between health and built environment sectors","Impact":"Influence of urban development on public health not adequately addressed","Mitigation":"Promote collaboration and integration between health and built environment professionals","Technologies":"Urban planning technologies, health impact assessment tools","People":"Health and built environment professionals","Owner":"Health and urban development organizations"},{"Description":"Built environment-related factors influencing the spread of malaria","Impact":"Increased prevalence of malaria and other VBDs","Mitigation":"Implement design and construction practices that combat the spread of vector-borne diseases","Technologies":"Health-aware construction materials and design principles","People":"City residents in malaria-affected areas","Owner":"Architects, urban planners, and construction professionals"}]}
